data.name: Gotham Gangsta | FPS vs VIVE | Local Multi-Player Bank Robbery
data.detailed_description:
Asymmetric MultiPlayer Added!


Asymmetric MultiPlayer Added!
Now one player uses the VIVE to rob banks and the other gets to be a cop to try and stop them... with bullets!


Christmas Launch Sale


Merry Christmas, open this present first!


About the Game

The job simulator of bank robbery. Gotham Gangsta is an action packed VR game where you rob banks! You don't start with $%#@! You've got to make that money. This life is full of tough %$@# choices. Build up your team and arsenal with the dough from every $%#@ job. Then get ready for the big $*%^@ scores - like a gangsta.

Gotham Gangsta!

Exclusive FPS vs VIVE Asymmetric Multiplayer.

One player uses the VIVE to rob banks - the other gets to be a cop to try and stop em'... with bullets!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
